alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mississippi and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fulton, or over Fort Pillow State Park, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Pillow State Park and Fulton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
